blogPost.excerpt: Introducing Smart Components in Framer, a new standard for interactive component design. From complete navigations and buttons with multiple states to nested hover effects, build anything visually and in just a few clicks—no code required. https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF
blogPost.body: Introducing Smart Components in Framer, a new standard for interactive component design. From complete navigations and buttons with multiple states to nested hover effects, build anything visually and in just a few clicks—no code required. https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF
blogPost.title: Smart Components by Framer - Design interactive components with multiple variants
blogPost.author: Benjamin den Boer

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能组件，这是一个交互式组件设计的新标准。从具有多种状态的完整导航和按钮到嵌套的悬停效果，只需点击几下就能建立任何视觉效果--无需代码。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。
localize.tagline: 设计具有多种变体的交互式组件

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能組件，這是一個交互式組件設計的新標準。從具有多種狀態的完整導航和按鈕到嵌套的懸停效果，只需點擊幾下就能建立任何視覺效果--無需代碼。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。
localize.tagline: 設計具有多種變體的交互式組件

previous.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
previous.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm

localize.description: 拉美地区公司的端到端支出管理。发放无限的实体卡或虚拟卡，为每张卡设置限额，实时了解您团队的支出情况，并在发票匹配等繁琐任务上节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 为拉美地区的公司提供清晰、简化的支出管理。

localize.description: 拉美地區公司的端到端支出管理。發放無限的實體卡或虛擬卡，爲每張卡設置限額，實時瞭解您團隊的支出情況，並在發票匹配等繁瑣任務上節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲拉美地區的公司提供清晰、簡化的支出管理。
